page.title: 01LITTLE WITLEY - A SUMMARY
page.content: This is a{rural}area, based on a village, with a small population.There are old established farming families as well as affluent commuters to towns like Birmingham. Unemployment is low and local nurseries, farms and orchards provide opportunities for casual work. The area has no shops or pubs and {very few amenities.}Despite this lack of facilities Little Witley is a very active and{close-knit community}which generates its own social life. This social life thrives from close communication between the Women's monthly meetings and the men's Social Club evenings. Newcomers are quickly integrated into the community. The text describes in detail the village organizations, work done on the land and the homelife of families. Ecology and houses are also described.
